decisions.label: Batch WO needs to be deleted

decisions.description: If all the WOLIs under the original Delivery Batch WO are assigned, then that WO can be tagged for deletion.

decisions.description: If started from Delivery Batch (custom object), we cannot rely on the record id prefix for identification. To keep this simple, we assume that an unknown record prefix is Delivery Batch.
decisions.name: Started_from_which_object
decisions.label: Started from which object?

Flow.description:
Allows IM to select Installer and the work (WOLIs) that he should take care of.
7.5.2024: Added logic to transfer the Content Document Links from original WOLIs to new WOLIs. 19.3.2024: Added logic to show overlapping work for the Installer for the selected work start date. 18.3.2024: Allow to see already scheduled work for the selected Installer for the set time frame. 18.3.2024: ST assignment fix. Show scheduled start/end dates when reserving work. 26.2.2024: First version.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Find Delivery Batches that are related to the Opportunity.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: DeliveryBatchSelection

formulas.description: Calculates next possible business date (non-weekend day) for the given date + offset of days.
formulas.name: fxCalculatedBusinessDayEndDateTime
formulas.expression: CASE( WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE({!Select_Work_Start_Date})), 1, (DATEVALUE({!Select_Work_Start_Date})) + {!fxNbrInstallationDays} + FLOOR(({!fxNbrInstallationDays}-1)/5)*2, 2, (DATEVALUE({!Select_Work_Start_Date})) + {!fxNbrInstallationDays} + FLOOR(({!fxNbrInstallationDays})/5)*2, 3, (DATEVALUE({!Select_Work_Start_Date})) + {!fxNbrInstallationDays} + FLOOR(({!fxNbrInstallationDays}+1)/5)*2, 4, (DATEVALUE({!Select_Work_Start_Date})) + {!fxNbrInstallationDays} + FLOOR(({!fxNbrInstallationDays}+2)/5)*2, 5, (DATEVALUE({!Select_Work_Start_Date})) + {!fxNbrInstallationDays} + FLOOR(({!fxNbrInstallationDays}+3)/5)*2, 6, (DATEVALUE({!Select_Work_Start_Date})) + {!fxNbrInstallationDays} + CEILING(({!fxNbrInstallationDays})/5)*2, 7, (DATEVALUE({!Select_Work_Start_Date})) - IF(1>0,1,0) + {!fxNbrInstallationDays} + CEILING(({!fxNbrInstallationDays})/5)*2, null)

formulas.name: fxCalculatedEndDateTime
formulas.expression: IF( {!fxNbrInstallationDays} = 0, /* Only when the work fits into one day */ {!fxCalculatedEndTime}, /* User modified start date + WO duration */ DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT( {!fxCalculatedBusinessDayEndDateTime} ) & " " & "14:00:00" ) /* Date of the day when WO duration is fulfilled + time */ )

formulas.description: First estimate to be used in WO creation. Updated later in the flow when actual figures are calculated.
formulas.name: fxSelectedStartDateTimePlusOneDay

Flow.label: Opportunity - Split work to installers R4

fields.name: InfoText1
fields.fieldText: You are about to create work for {!Select_Resource_for_the_work}.

fields.name: CreateSAandSchedule
fields.fieldText:
The visit for {!Select_Resource_for_the_work} will now be created and scheduled.


Visit will be scheduled for: {!Select_Work_Start_Date} - {!fxCalculatedEndDateTime}

fields.name: ErrorNoDataSelected
fields.fieldText: Error! No work items were selected. Try again.

fields.name: ARcreationFailed
fields.fieldText: Error! Failed to assign the created Service Appointment to {!Select_Resource_for_the_work}.

fields.name: SAcreationFailed
fields.fieldText: Error! Service Appointment for the created work could not be created!

fields.name: WOcreationFailed
fields.fieldText: Error! Work Order for the selected batch rows could not be created!

fields.name: WOLIcreationFailed
fields.fieldText: Error! Work Order Line Items for the selected batch rows could not be created!

screens.name: Failed_to_delete_work_from_Batch
screens.label: Failed to delete work from Batch

fields.name: WorkDeletionFailed
fields.fieldText: Error! Failed to delete the assigned work (WOLIs) from the original Batch data.

screens.name: Failed_to_delete_work_order_from_Batch
screens.label: Failed to delete work order from Batch

fields.name: WorkOrderDeletionFailed
fields.fieldText: Error! Failed to delete the original Batch Work Order.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_WorkDeletionFailed
fields.fieldText: Error! Failed to update the original Batch data.

fields.name: Selected_Installer
fields.fieldText: There is already scheduled work for {!Select_Resource_for_the_work} around the selected time ({!Select_Work_Start_Date})!

fields.name: RemoveWorkText
fields.fieldText: Next the work that has now been set to {!Select_Resource_for_the_work} will be removed from the original Batch. Only the unassigned work remains in the Batch.

fields.name: RemoveWOText
fields.fieldText: The original Batch WO will be removed as there is no more unassigned work remaining in the Batch.

fields.name: Guidance_for_data_selection
fields.fieldText: Please select work items for the selected Installer.
